com.wessles.MERCury

Class Core

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wessles.MERCury.Core
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Demo

    public abstract class Core
extends java.lang.Object
    The Core that will host the game. It is ran above by the Runner class.
    Author:
    wessles
